name: Swimlane
description: Search application records in Swimlane, a security automation, orchestration and incident response platform

options.name: URL
options.description: URL of the Swimlane instance to use including the schema (i.e., https://). This option should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Username
options.description: The username for the account you wish to authenticate as.

options.name: Password
options.description: The password for the provided user.

options.name: Applications
options.description: A comma-delimited, case-insensitive list of application names you would like to search. Provide the application name and not the application id. This option should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Maximum number of results to return
options.description: The maximum number of results that will be returned to the overlay window.  Defaults to 10. This option should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Number of Summary Tags to Display
options.description: The number of record IDs to show in the Polarity Overlay window summary. Defaults to 5. This option should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".
